alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong outflow boundary from thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Judith Basin, western Fergus, southwestern Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary produced from thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Black Eagle to 8 miles southwest of Highwood to near Belt. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belt, Geraldine, Highwood, Shonkin, Floweree, Armington and Portage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County
